reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent only one night. Great value for money in a great location. As others have said double rooms on the small side but you are in Paris. Staff more than helpful. Recommended.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location

reviews.text: We stayed at the Innova for three nights and thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. We had a third floor front room with en-suite, and although our accommodation was fairly compact it suited our needs perfectly. The bedroom consisted of a double bed, wardrobe, two small tables with two chairs, and the en-suite was fitted with a powerful shower instead of a bath – which suited us just fine. In addition there was a colour TV and hair dryer provided.
reviews.title: Good Value - Clean - Good location

likes.liked: — Good value, clean and tidy , good location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Innova for 5 nights in June. Three of us shared a triple room, which was a bit cramped with all our luggage (we had a lot of luggage).
reviews.title: Great view of teh Eiffel Tower

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised to have an excellent view of the Eiffel Tower from the top floor. (They only have a few rooms like that) We didn't order an airconditioned room but didn't need one in June (coming from a warm climate). The room was clean, and about average size for Paris. The bathroom was modern and a reasonable size for the price. The Day staff couldn't have been more helpful, but there was just one guy (who worked nights) who had an attitude. The breakfasts were good, but basic. The breakfast staff didn't speak English, but receptionists all spoke good English.
reviews.title: Not so sure I liked this hotel!

likes.disliked: — Rooms felt dirty and smelt like smoke even though they had been renovated recently

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's in a nice enough part of Paris, and very handy for facilities. There is an excellent Patisserie across the street, and a good bar/ bistro at the corner just down from it (service was lightning speed). There is also a laundry about a block away. We tried most eateries in the area (including fast food) and didn't have any complaints). The crepes were beautiful.
reviews.title: Bon

reviews.text: We stayed at Hotel Innova for 4 nights at the end of June. My husband and I shared a family room with our 2 daughters, our first trip to Paris. We were really pleased with the hotel, which we had chosen over the Internet, with help from Trip Advisor. It's in a very good location, with an underground stop right outside, cafe's all around, supermarkets, etc. We had a wonderful time in Paris! Would definitely stay in this hotel again. One tip for future tourists - bring along some little plastic bowls and some cutlery sets, get food at the local supermarkets, and you'll save a lot of money and have fun picnicing in the bargain.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay
Lovely staff, friendliest people in Paris
reviews.text: I thought the hotel was lovely, the staff were the friendliest people I met in Paris, they recomended things to see and do. the location is good, about twenty minute walk from the eiffel tower and les invalides and only two minutes away from loads of restaurants, cafes and bars . Do not get a pizza from the late night place that is next door dreadful!

reviews.title: The reviews are right
reviews.text: Myself and my boyfriend went to paris for 4 nights. We choose this hotel due to the reviews it received. We booked a superior room on the 7th floor 400e for both of us for 4 nights. The staff were lovely. The man on reception advised us to go to lavel restaurant which is only across the street and up the road. If you say you are staying in Hotel innova you get a glass of kir champagne free! (its 9.50e on menu. I have to sing the praises of a restuarant only doors down from the hotel 'manger la salle' something like that, but a 3 course meal is only 19e it is wonderful and the man running the place is so nice. I cant understand why people gave out about the lift it is bright mirror lined and modern. Fab FAB fab hotel hopefully going back in the sringtime. Great location you dont realise how good it is to have a metro station across the road until you get over there, i want to take the paris metro back home to Ireland.
